coreAttributes.name: Monica's Moo Milker
coreAttributes.description: A manual cow-themed breast pump, complete with plastic beaker, which used to belong to Monica.
coreAttributes.applyEffects: This Moo Milker has a limited-edition custom colour scheme, and has also had its suction cup enlarged. The writing 'Monica's Milker' on the side makes it clear who its owner is.

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] a closer look at the Moo Milker...
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(show)] off the Moo Milker to [npc2.name], who pretends to be impressed by its custom colour scheme...
